wallet.info: Your password is mandatory and controls when and how your funds may be spent. If you forget this password you will be unable to transfer your shares.
wallet.pwd_too_short: Password is too short. It must be 9 or more characters.
wallet.pwd_too_long: Password is too long. It can be at most 255 characters.

wallet_common.pw_too_short: Password must be 9 or more characters.

brain_wallet.no_secure_random: We are very sorry, we can't proceed on this device.  Your browser does not provide secure random numbers.
brain_wallet.password_info: This is your encryption password for this wallet.
brain_wallet.only_on_this_device: This password is used only on this device.
brain_wallet.create_info: A wallet with this password was not found on this device.  Re-enter your password to setup a new wallet.
brain_wallet.new_brainkey_header: Use this brain-key to recover your wallet on any device.
brain_wallet.new_brainkey_info0: WARNING: Anyone with access to your brain key will have access to this wallet. It is not possible to recover a lost brain-key.
brain_wallet.new_brainkey_info1: Make a backup, print it out, write it down, etc.. but always keep this information secret.
brain_wallet.new_brainkey_info2: The brain-key shown here is not password protected.
brain_wallet.new_brainkey_info3: This brain-key will be saved for you on this device only so you will need to make another backup.
brain_wallet.mouse_entropy_info: Move around to collect additional random data.  This will be combine this with your browser's secure random numbers and used to create your brain-key.
brain_wallet.too_short: Brain-key must be 32 or more characters.

market.title: Market
market.margin_orders_explain: A margin call will be executed any time the lowest ask is less than 110% of the moving average and the lowest ask is more than the call price.  The initial call price is 150% of the short price (ie: PLS 45.00 for a short entered at PLS 30.00).  This is the price at which 75% of the collateral would be required to buy back the USD necessary to cover the position.  If a margin call is executed and there is any collateral left over, then 5% is kept as network fees and 95% is returned to the owner.
market.margin_call_price_explain: The initial call price is 150% of the short price (ie: PLS 45.00 for a short entered at PLS 30.00).  This is the price at which 75% of the collateral would be required to buy back the USD necessary to cover the position.

tip.bid_price_too_high: Your bid price is {{value}}% higher than the lowest ask.
tip.ask_price_too_low: Your ask price is {{value}}% lower than the highest bid.
tip.short_price_too_low: Your short price is {{value}}% lower than the highest bid.
tip.short_price_should_above_min_range: Short price should be above min range price
tip.short_price_should_below_max_range: Short price should be below max range price
tip.total_cost_updated: Total was updated, please review and re-submit
tip.confirm_order: Please confirm your order. The order will be funded via {{value}} account.

help.buy_quantity: The amount of {{value}} that you would like to buy.
help.buy_price: The amount you are willing to pay in {{base}} per {{quantity}}.
help.buy_lowest_ask: The lowest price at which your buy order can be immediately matched.
help.buy_total: The number of {{base}} that will be withdrawn from {{account}} account to fund this order.
help.sell_quantity: The amount of {{value}} that you would like to sell.
help.sell_price: The amount you are willing to get in {{base}} per {{quantity}}.
help.sell_highest_bid: The highest price at which your sell order can be immediately matched.
help.sell_total: The number of {{base}} that will be deposited to {{account}} account after sell order is executed.
help.short_quantity: The approximate number of {{value}} that you would like to borrow and sell.
help.short_collateral: The number of {{value}} that you are willing to post as collateral. You should provide 3x backing at the trade price and quantity, 2x comes from short seller and 1x from buyer.
help.short_price_limit_direct: The highest price in {{base}} per {{quantity}} at which you are willing to borrow and sell {{base}}. Short orders only match at the price feed or price limit, whichever is less.
help.short_price_limit_inverted: The lowest price in {{base}} per {{quantity}} at which you are willing to borrow and sell {{quantity}}. Short orders only match at the price feed or price limit, whichever is more.
help.short_feed_price: The median exchange rate on external exchanges according to delegates.
help.short_total: The amount {{value}} required to fund this order. Calculated as Quantity times Collateral Ratio.
help.short_interest_rate: The interest rate you are willing to pay.

rules.title: Market Rules Summary
rules.conditions: Short orders can only get filled under these conditions:
rules.condition1: There is someone willing to buy BitUSD at the price feed
rules.condition2: AND Your short order is the highest interest rate order
rules.condition3: AND Your price limit is lower than the feed (PLS per USD) or you didn't specify a price limit
rules.condition4: AND You have enough collateral to provide 2x backing at the trade price and quantity
rules.condition5: OR Your price limit is higher than the feed (PLS per USD) and someone is willing to buy at your price limit
rules.short1: Short orders are forced to cover after 30 days by taking the best offers at the time. No fee is charged.
rules.short2: Short orders are forced to cover when 75% of their collateral is required to cover, leaving the short with 25% of the collateral minus a 5% fee.
rules.cover_fee: The 5% fee is assessed as a percent of the collateral left over after covering.

note.explain: You can write private/public journal and store them on blockchain.  Only you can view your private journals.
note.fee_explain: fee consists of transaction fee and journal fee.  (Each KB of journal content costs 5 {{symbol}} )

pot.title: Jackpot
pot.explain: Blockchain will draw 8 winners from secret note composers on daily basis to share 1/14 of current pot.  Level1: 1 winner for 40% of pot; Level2: 2 winners for 30% of pot; Level3: 5 winners for 30% of pot.

privacy.email_warning3: Your email is not shared with anyone and no one will be able to send you spam.

help.title: Help
help.console_intro: For a list of commands go to the console page, type help, and press Enter.
help.valid_names_intro: Only lowercase alphanumeric characters, dots, and dashes are allowed. Names must start with a letter and cannot end with a dash. The characters, which are delimited by dots, have to form a valid name. Dots cannot be consecutive or be at start or end of the name.
help.low_participation_rate_80: is displayed when delegate participation rate drops below 80%.
help.low_participation_rate_60: is displayed when delegate participation rate drops below 60%.  Low delegate participation makes blockchain forks likely.
